title: Online job recruitment platform
content:
HH.ru, also known as HeadHunter, is a premier online recruitment platform in Russia and the CIS region.
It connects job seekers with employers through extensive job listings, a robust resume database, and advanced employer tools.
The platform offers career resources, company reviews, and market analysis, helping individuals find job opportunities and supporting employers in their recruitment efforts.
HH.ru's user-friendly interface and mobile app enhance the job search experience, making it a vital resource in the employment market.
